statements: SELECT * FROM training_datasets;
SELECT dataset_name, annotations FROM training_datasets WHERE id = '1234';
SELECT id, dataset_name FROM training_datasets WHERE dataset_name ILIKE 'image%';
SELECT * FROM training_datasets WHERE metadata ->> 'created_by' = 'John Doe';
SELECT id, dataset_name FROM training_datasets ORDER BY dataset_name DESC;
SELECT id, dataset_name, annotations, metadata FROM training_datasets WHERE id = '1'
SELECT dataset_name, annotations FROM training_datasets WHERE annotations->>'label' = 'cat'
SELECT * FROM training_datasets WHERE metadata @> '{"source": "external"}'
SELECT dataset_name, annotations FROM training_datasets WHERE dataset_name LIKE '%dataset%'
SELECT id, dataset_name, metadata FROM training_datasets ORDER BY dataset_name ASC
SELECT * FROM dataset_metadata;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_description FROM dataset_metadata ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT dataset_name, annotation_count FROM dataset_metadata WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM dataset_annotations WHERE annotation_author = 'John Doe';
SELECT annotation_text, annotation_author, annotation_date FROM dataset_annotations ORDER BY annotation_date ASC;
SELECT id, dataset_name FROM dataset_metadata;
SELECT id, dataset_name, dataset_description FROM dataset_metadata WHERE id > 5;
SELECT annotation_author, annotation_text FROM dataset_annotations WHERE annotation_author = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM dataset_metadata WHERE creation_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY dataset_name DESC;
SELECT dataset_id, COUNT(annotation_id) AS Annotation_Count FROM dataset_annotations GROUP BY dataset_id HAVING Annotation_Count > 10;
SELECT * FROM AI_Training_Datasets_Metadata;
SELECT dataset_id, dataset_name, dataset_description FROM AI_Training_Datasets_Metadata;
SELECT annotation_text, annotation_author, annotation_date FROM Annotations;
SELECT dataset_id, tag_name, tag_creator FROM Dataset_Tags;
SELECT * FROM AI_Training_Datasets_Metadata JOIN Annotations ON AI_Training_Datasets_Metadata.dataset_id = Annotations.dataset_id;
SELECT * FROM AI_Training_Datasets_Metadata;
SELECT dataset_id, dataset_name FROM AI_Training_Datasets_Metadata ORDER BY dataset_name DESC;
SELECT dataset_id, dataset_name, dataset_description FROM AI_Training_Datasets_Metadata WHERE dataset_name LIKE 'Data%';
SELECT A.annotation_text, A.annotation_author, A.annotation_date, D.dataset_name FROM Annotations A INNER JOIN AI_Training_Datasets_Metadata D ON A.dataset_id = D.dataset_id;
SELECT D.dataset_name, T.tag_name, T.tag_description FROM AI_Training_Datasets_Metadata D INNER JOIN Dataset_Tags T ON D.dataset_id = T.dataset_id ORDER BY D.dataset_name ASC, T.tag_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM dataset_annotations;
SELECT id, annotation FROM dataset_annotations WHERE dataset_id = '12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789abc';
SELECT * FROM datasets ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, name FROM datasets WHERE description LIKE '%data%';
SELECT id, metadata FROM metadata WHERE dataset_id = '87654321-4321-4321-4321-210987654321';
SELECT * FROM dataset_annotations ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT annotation, created_at FROM dataset_annotations WHERE dataset_id = 'd7ebbd0a-d897-46f9-8eaa-345d5f69835e';
SELECT * FROM datasets WHERE name LIKE '%example%' AND description ILIKE '%data%';
SELECT id, annotation FROM annotations WHERE created_at >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY annotation ASC;
SELECT id, dataset_id, metadata FROM metadata WHERE JSONB_ARRAY_LENGTH(metadata->'tags') > 0;
SELECT * FROM dataset_metadata;
SELECT dataset_id, dataset_name, creation_date FROM dataset_metadata ORDER BY creation_date DESC;
SELECT dataset_name, dataset_description FROM dataset_metadata WHERE dataset_id = 1;
SELECT model_name, model_type, model_description FROM model_metadata WHERE model_type = 'Regression';
SELECT annotation_text FROM dataset_annotations WHERE dataset_id = 2 ORDER BY annotation_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM dataset_metadata WHERE dataset_id = 1;
SELECT dataset_name, creation_date FROM dataset_metadata WHERE creation_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT model_name, model_type, model_description FROM model_metadata WHERE model_type = 'classification';
SELECT result_id, result_score FROM model_results WHERE result_score > 0.8 ORDER BY result_score DESC;
SELECT dataset_id, COUNT(*) AS num_annotations FROM dataset_annotations GROUP BY dataset_id;
